name: Metro PD: Close to You
description:
This is a Steam version of a hit visual novel game released on the mobile reader app Love 365: Find Your Story by Voltage Inc. It is a collection of romantic, richly illustrated interactive stories with the following premise:

In Metro PD: Close to You, join an elite group of detectives at the Metropolitan Police Department. Partner up with a handsome senior detective to go on undercover investigations and solve dangerous cases such as serial bombings - and of course, overcoming these life-or-death situations will bring you two closer together... Experience a world straight out of a procedural drama, as thrilling as it is romantic.

An opening movie and adventure feature have been added to the Steam release, so even players that have previously read the app version will discover more things to enjoy.

The Story:
"You're my partner as of today."

You're a rookie detective. Your training?
Trial by fire, solving a dangerous case together!

Get yourselves out of tight binds
and discover an even stronger bond with each other.

Will you catch the real culprit?
And will your case come to a romantic conclusion?

A lethal love where you watch each other's backs.
What will come of your dangerous and thrilling romance?!

Whether on the job or in love,
there's never a dull moment!

Characters:
Hiroshi Kirisawa "The Rugged Boss"
Kazusa Hanai "The Perfectionist Detective"
Yutaka Tennoji "The Unmatched Senior Detective"
Tadanobu Nomura "The Flirty Deputy Chief"
Masashi Himuro "The Ruthless Coroner"

Contents:
Includes Main Stories from the app Love 365: Find Your Story up until "24 Hours and Counting" (Except Nomura)
*His PoV Stories are counted as Special Stories and thus not included
